snippet: President Obama offered his apologies to people who were forced off their health insurance plans by the Affordable Care Act despite “assurances from me.”
abstract: Pres Obama bows to mounting criticism that he misled the American people about health care law, apologizing to people who were forced off their health insurance plans by the Affordable Care Act despite 'assurances from me.'
lead_paragraph: President Obama offered his apologies to people who were forced off their health insurance plans by the Affordable Care Act despite “assurances from me.”

headline.main: Apologizing, Obama Yields to Criticism of Health Law
headline.print_headline: Apologizing, Obama Yields To Criticism Of Health Law

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
